mfp:adapter.name: LDAPLogin
mfp:adapter.description: Authenticate users against configured LDAP server

property.name: ldapUserAttribute
property.displayName: The attribute LDAP ldap to be used as username

property.name: ldapDisplayNameAttribute
property.displayName: The attribute from LDAP to be used as dislayName

property.name: ldapAdminDN
property.displayName: The LDAP admin DN (* for none)

property.name: ldapAdminPassword
property.displayName: The LDAP admin password (* for none)

property.name: ldapSearchString
property.displayName: The LDAP search string, use {searchValue} as placeholder

property.name: blockedStateExpirationSec
property.displayName: How long before the client can try again (seconds)

property.name: successStateExpirationSec
property.displayName: How long is a successful state valid for (seconds)
